import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './StyleSheets/navBar.css' function NavBar({Adminauth, Userauth}) { return (
JobHunt
  • Home
  • Career
    • Get Hired
    • Post Job
  • {!Userauth && Admin}
  • {!Adminauth && User}
); } export default NavBar;
